subtasks: Examine the machine to identify the problem
Locate necessary tools and replacement parts
Access the machine's components to make repairs
Apply lubricant or perform oil changes
Tighten bolts or other fasteners
Test the machine's functionality after repairs
Inspect fields for readiness
Check irrigation systems for maintenance needs
Assess machinery for any required troubleshooting
Order or collect seeds and fertilizers
Coordinate with team members for harvest preparation
Plan rotation of crops if necessary
Monitor crop growth and health
Check for pests or disease infestations
Apply pesticides or herbicides as needed
Adjust irrigation based on weather conditions
Tend to livestock, including feeding and veterinary care
Document farm activities and maintenance
Communicate with buyers or customers about produce
Perform or coordinate equipment cleaning and maintenance
